name: TinyMaze
description:
This game is for MiniJam 82: Doodle. The limitation is only 1 room. This is the first game I've ever made, so please keep expectations low. My main goal for this jam was to create a 3D playable third person game, and to experiment with different textures. I used wall textures from here: https://ethantaylor.itch.io/cyberpunk-materials

I also used HDRP.  I don't think older PC's without any Direct11/12 support will be able to run this game. Why I decided to try using HDRP on the first game I've ever made is a question I can't answer.

I don't really consider this game finished, but I will not be updating it.

Controls are WASD or arrow keys to move, and mouse for camera
